vis_2_widgets_gauges_arc_padding_title: The distance between the elements in the arc (default 0.05)
vis_2_widgets_gauges_margin_in_percent_t: Margin for the chart inside the containing SVG element (default 0.05)
vis_2_widgets_gauges_anim_delay_tooltip: Delay in ms before starting the needle animation
vis_2_widgets_gauges_animate_duration_to: Duration in ms for the needle animation
vis_2_widgets_gauges_text_size_tooltip: The relative height of the text to display in the wave circle. A value of 1 equals 50% of the radius of the outer circle.
vis_2_widgets_gauges_rise_animation_time: The amount of time in milliseconds for the wave to rise from 0 to it's final height.
vis_2_widgets_gauges_wave_animation_time: The amount of time in milliseconds for a full wave to enter the wave circle.
vis_2_widgets_gauges_wave_amplitude_tool: The wave height as a percentage of the radius of the wave circle.
vis_2_widgets_gauges_wave_frequency_tool: The number of full waves per width of the wave circle.
vis_2_widgets_gauges_inner_radius_toolti: The radius of the inner circle. A value of 0.9 equals 90% of the radius of the outer circle.
vis_2_widgets_gauges_outer_radius_toolti: The radius of the outer circle. A value of 1 equals 100% of the radius of the outer circle.
vis_2_widgets_gauges_margin_tooltip: The size of the gap between the outer circle and wave circle as a percentage of the radius of the outer circle. A value of 0.025 equals 2.5% of the radius of the outer circle.
vis_2_widgets_gauges_aspect_ratio_toolti: Gauge aspect ratio, At padding 0 easy to create battery types -> D = 0.56, C = 0.52, AA = 0.28, AAA = 0.23, AAAA = 0.19 , default C battery
vis_2_widgets_gauges_no_of_cells_tooltip: More than 1, will create cell battery
vis_2_widgets_gauges_level_stop_opacity_: Value from 0 to 1, 0 is transparent, 1 is opaque
vis_2_widgets_gauges_level_threshold_too: Absolute value of the level threshold. First level is 0, last is MAX
